statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;

SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 AND gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT users.username, profiles.full_name FROM users JOIN profiles ON users.user_id = profiles.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM logs GROUP BY user_id;
